ext_description.p:
An Altered_packaged_part is a type of
whose used_package is an . The material or shape properties are different from the reference .
ext_description.note:
For packaged parts that may have several alternate configurations (such as different lead configurations), an "unaltered" configuration can be designated using the base_packaged_part attribute. This base_packaged_part is then referenced by each Altered_packaged_part, along with the used_package, which references the
for that Altered_packaged_part. This relationship supports the traceability of altered parts, as well as the capability to readily identify potential replacement parts if a specific, altered part is out of stock.
